text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Whoo! Finally, finally, finally, finally! It's finally starting!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That is correct! The curtains covering our commemoration of the WINNING DREAM STAGE are finally…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: The endless wasteland… filled with untouched gold veins and mysterious ancient ruins! Mac-chan, take my hand! Let's embark on a new adventure!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: What are you trying to do!? We are performing a L-I-V-E concert! Do you understand? A live concert!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, Golshi is saying crazy things again. But I guess it's McQueen's fault for always believing what she says… Wait, hmm?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hello, Spe-chan?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes!? My name is Special Week and I will be singing!?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Spe-chan, it's not your turn yet, you know? You seem… really nervous.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Auu… Y-Yes, just a little… Wait no, I'm really nervous!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Everyone's been working really hard to make sure that everything goes well today… I just don't want to ruin it…!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yuh stupid idjit!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Nuwa! Spe, you're always lookin back!! You need to start facin' your toes forward, doncha think!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: E-Eh!? M-My toes…? But they're always facing forward!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Err, well… While I may not fully understand what Goldship-san is saying, it still makes se-… or rather, it still makes about 20% sense.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: To commemorate something is to not only remember what happened in the past, but also to carve out a new future with it.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Well, in short, it's not about what we've done so far, it's about what we're going to do from now on. That's what she meant♪

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: You can do it, Spe-chan. Just remember…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Since the beginning, we've been running forward with all our heart… day after day, rain or shine, right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Don't look back… Just keep moving forward. Forward…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: We will convey our hopes and dreams with our song…!
